body:
Fellows,


Links to help arrange travel and accommodation have been added to the  
Workshop webpage:
http://www.iesd.dmu.ac.uk/~jm/radiance2006work.html


Workshop fees will vary by no more than +-£20 from the values given  
on the webpage.  We'll be asking for deposits/payment in the next few  
weeks.


Presentations:  A good number have already been promised, but we do  
need some more.  Could all those intending to give presentations and  
who are not listed on the webpage please contact me as soon as  
possible (just a title will do for now).  Similarly, could all those  
intending to come to the workshop and who have not yet confirmed by e- 
mail please do so asap.


Regards,


-John Mardaljevic




Dr. John Mardaljevic
Senior Research Fellow
Institute of Energy and Sustainable Development
De Montfort University
The Gateway
Leicester
LE1 9BH, UK
+44 (0) 116 257 7972
+44 (0) 116 257 7981 (fax)


jm at dmu.ac.uk
http://www.iesd.dmu.ac.uk/~jm
